fees.description: Min connection fee inc GST. Fees can vary for meter type, location or other factors. All fees here www.globirdenergy.com.au/fees
For move-out customer needs a final read only. Fees can vary for meter type, location or other factors. All fees here www.globirdenergy.com.au/fees

electricityContract.terms: This offer is restricted plan and is not available to all customers. This offer is for NSW residential customers who have a Qualifying System and must meet and remain compliant with the Eligibility Criteria and all other requirements of the Virtual Power Plant Terms and Conditions. For further information about this offer call GloBird on 133456 or visit www.globirdenergy.com.au to see our full terms and conditions.

discounts.description: $1/Day when imports are 0.03 kWh/hour or less, between 6pm-8pm (Local Time). Up to $365 per year.

electricityContract.variation: We may update your solar feed-in, or your rates from time to time. We'll always notify you in writing prior to any change.

incentives.description: $0.00 for consumption between 11am-2pm (Local Time), excluding controlled load.
incentives.displayName: Perfect if you love free stuff

incentives.description: $1/Day when imports are 0.03 kWh/hour or less, between 6pm-8pm (Local Time).
15 cents/kWh applies to the first 10 kWh of exports between 6pm-8pm (Local Time) everyday, and is inclusive of any other Feed-in tariff as applicable in Energy Plan.

$1/kWh applies to any export during a Critical Peak-Export event. The timing of these events is determined at our discretion, as detailed in a notice we provide. Your premises' metering installation must support 5-minute interval data.

5 cents/kWh applies to any import during a Critical Peak-Import event. The timing of these events is determined at our discretion, as detailed in a notice we provide. Your premises' metering installation must support 5-minute interval data.

eligibility.description: You must have installed an eligible solar-PV.
You must have an eligible smart meter.
You must have installed an eligible battery.

solarFeedInTariff.description: GloBird currently pay 6.00 cents/kWh solar feed-in between 4pm and 9pm (inc. GST if any).
GloBird currently pay 0.00 cents/kWh solar feed-in for other time (inc. GST if any).

electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply, please see: https://www.globirdenergy.com.au/legal/fees/
